alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 13 at 5:34PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SHELBY AND NORTHWESTERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 615 PM EST... At 534 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from near Anna to near Bradford, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Rapidly changing visibility and up to half an inch of snow accumulation. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Driving conditions may change quickly. Slick roads are possible. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Piqua, Anna, Jackson Center, Botkins, Hardin, Port Jefferson, Kettlersville, Lockington, Montra, Polo, Newbern, Plattsville, Maplewood, Mccartyville, Swanders, Pemberton, Houston and Bloomer. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 83 and 102.
info.instruction: Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
